title: Book of Revelation, End Times and the Anti-Christ - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/8/17
itunes:title: Book of Revelation, End Times and the Anti-Christ - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/8/17
description:
George Noory and biblical scholar Michael Rood discuss his research into prophesy of the coming Apocalypse and End Times, and his theories into the possible identity of the Anti-Christ.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
